page.title: 18JOBS WE DO
page.content: There is one shop,a garage and six public houses in our grid no other industry exists in our village,so everyone has to travel out to work. Most people go into Swindon or the nearby industrial estates,but because we are nearthe M4 some go much further.We did a survey,three fathers travelled everywhere,two went to London,two to Newbury,one to Reading,one to Marlborough,one to Faringdon,one to Watchfield and one to Oxford. The main places of work in Swindon are Allied Dunbar,an insurance firm,Burmah Oil,Raychem an electrical company,several computer companies Intel,Logica and Koda,The Railways and the Post Office. Many of our mothers go to work as well,also into Swindon.
